metadata.synopsis: Despite the fact that footloose Joey Coalter (William Petersen) is married to Christine (Sissy Spacek), he spends little time with her or their child, Beth (Olivia Burnette). Eventually, Joey leaves home and takes work as a cowboy, only to learn that his ex-wife is about to marry wealthy businessman Walt (Brian Kerwin). Suddenly jealous, Joey hightails it home and does his best to stop the wedding. He is aided in his quest by Beth, who really just wants her father back.

reviews: ...a slight, instantly forgettable romantic comedy that doesn't possess any real depth...
All but dripping with downhome charm, small-town coziness, and lovable kook overload.
Hard Promises was made in the spirit of a brainless sitcom, but if you stand back from the movie and really look at it, you're struck by how weird all of the characters are.
